entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has a close relationship with Harry. He is described as looking 'woebegone' and has a bloody nose.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story and is being asked by Hagrid to do something. He agrees to help Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and is also agreeing to help Hagrid.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who is being referred to by Hagrid as someone he doesn't want to notice them.

relationships.description: Hagrid is concerned that Umbridge will notice him and Harry leaving.
Harry agrees to help Hagrid with whatever he needs.
